scripts.prepare:mainnet: npm run clean && npx mustache config/mainnet.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml
scripts.prepare:avalanche: npm run clean && npx mustache config/avalanche.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml
scripts.prepare:arbitrum: npm run clean && npx mustache config/arbitrum.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml
scripts.prepare:polygon-mumbai: npm run clean && npx mustache config/polygon-mumbai.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml
scripts.init: npm run clean && graph clean && npx mustache config/init.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && graph codegen
